FDButils
  • Reference

Create Latin squares.

Get list of random latin squares.

latinList(nSquares = 3, nDims = 4)

Arguments

nSquares

Number of latin squares to create.
nDims

Size of latin squares.

Value

A list of latin squares, nSquares in length. Each square is nDims x nDims in size.

Details

Get list of random latin squares. At present, these are not guaranteed to be unique.

See also

latin

Examples

d <- 5
ll <- latinList(3,d)
ll
#> [[1]]
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    3    2    1    4    5
#> [2,]    5    1    2    3    4
#> [3,]    4    5    3    1    2
#> [4,]    1    4    5    2    3
#> [5,]    2    3    4    5    1
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    1    2    5    3    4
#> [2,]    3    1    2    4    5
#> [3,]    4    5    1    2    3
#> [4,]    5    4    3    1    2
#> [5,]    2    3    4    5    1
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>      [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#> [1,]    3    4    2    1    5
#> [2,]    1    2    3    5    4
#> [3,]    2    5    1    4    3
#> [4,]    4    1    5    3    2
#> [5,]    5    3    4    2    1
#> 
ll.mat <- Reduce(rbind,ll)
cond <- letters[1:d]
matrix(cond[ll.mat], ncol=d)
#>       [,1] [,2] [,3] [,4] [,5]
#>  [1,] "c"  "b"  "a"  "d"  "e" 
#>  [2,] "e"  "a"  "b"  "c"  "d" 
#>  [3,] "d"  "e"  "c"  "a"  "b" 
#>  [4,] "a"  "d"  "e"  "b"  "c" 
#>  [5,] "b"  "c"  "d"  "e"  "a" 
#>  [6,] "a"  "b"  "e"  "c"  "d" 
#>  [7,] "c"  "a"  "b"  "d"  "e" 
#>  [8,] "d"  "e"  "a"  "b"  "c" 
#>  [9,] "e"  "d"  "c"  "a"  "b" 
#> [10,] "b"  "c"  "d"  "e"  "a" 
#> [11,] "c"  "d"  "b"  "a"  "e" 
#> [12,] "a"  "b"  "c"  "e"  "d" 
#> [13,] "b"  "e"  "a"  "d"  "c" 
#> [14,] "d"  "a"  "e"  "c"  "b" 
#> [15,] "e"  "c"  "d"  "b"  "a"
